|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR5312A;Atheros, AR5312A-00; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS R4000 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 220<!-- 220 --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Altima;; |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 5.1 |pwr_poe_amp = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abg

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/01/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5112A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR2112A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141610120005E R02" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings are per the FCC manual. They may be inaccurate.
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''Delta Electronics''' ADP-15KB Rev. C.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Delta Electronics |model = ADP-15KB |revision = C |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=C13 |output_v=5.1 |output_a=3 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=modular, brick |countrymanuf = China }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
